name: BotBob
description:
In this game you guide a tiny robot called BotBob to its shiny destination!

Use the keyboard and mouse to play the game. Use the Play/Pause Button to either stop or move the robot.

More updates comming in the future!

This game was part of a game challenge and it was made in under 6 hours!

Part of the music/sound effects of this game were downloaded from ZapSplat:

“Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com“

Thanks!
